Package bridges

Object oriented Bridges graph API bridges

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractEdge  
    AbstractVertex
    Abstract graph vertex, with an unspecified adjacency construct.
    Bridge
    Connection to the Bridges server.
    BridgeNetwork  
    BSTEdge  
    BSTNode
    Generic Tree Node class, with visual components.
    DLListEdge  
    DLListNode  
    Edge
    Generic graph link, with visual components.
    GraphVisualizer
    Object Oriented Graph Visualizer intended to be used like: OOVisual v = new OOVisual();
    v.add("actor/Tom Hanks");
    v.get("actor/Tom Hanks).setColor("green");
    Node n = v.get("actor/Tom Hanks");
    n.setColor("blue");
    n.setSize(8.0);
    n.connect("movie/Big").setDashArray("5,5,5");
    Link n = n.get("movie/Big").setWidth("5,5,5");
    v.has("actor/Thorin Oakinshield");
    Link  
    LinkedList  
    SampleDataGenerator  
    StackEdge  
    StackNode  
    Validation  
    Vertex
    An implementation of AbstractVertex with HashMap for adjacency.
    Visualizer
    Visualizer interface to be implemented by GraphVisualizer, StackVisualizer, perhaps more.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Bridge.visual  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidValueException
    Exception indicating invalid CSS values.
    RateLimitException
    Throws exception to handle overloading the server to allow the student to stop querying the server and send in their visualizations.
